metadata.title: CVE-2023-0196 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit SDK contains a bug in cuobjdump, where a local userrunning the tool against an ill-formed binary may cause a null- pointerdereference, which may result in a limited denial of service.

criterions.comment: nvidia-cuda-toolkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
